name: Defender Glaive I
description: A glaive crafted especially to fight off calamity. Modified so that anybody can use it.

name: Champion Glaive II
description: A fortified glaive designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Champion Glaive III
description: A fortified glaive designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura Glaive II
description: An insect glaive forged in Kamura fires and fitted with blades of oxidized silver.

name: Champion Glaive
description: A fortified glaive designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Kamura Glaive I
description: An insect glaive forged in Kamura fires and fitted with blades of oxidized silver.

name: Guardian Glaive
description: Used by village defenders, this insect glaive fortifies one's power to protect like castle walls.

name: Kamura Glaive III
description: An insect glaive forged in Kamura fires and fitted with blades of oxidized silver.

name: Kamura Glaive IV
description: An insect glaive forged in Kamura fires and fitted with blades of oxidized silver.

name: Kamura Warrior Glaive
description: A weapon fit for a guardian of Kamura. Glaive in hand, go forth and conquer evil!

name: Kamura Glaive V
description: An insect glaive forged in Kamura fires and fitted with blades of oxidized silver.

name: Fine Kamura Glaive
description: An insect glaive gift from the village for continued deeds of heroism.

name: Duke's Scepter
description: A Malzeno insect glaive evoking a scepter, giving the wielder a taste of magnificent monarchy.

name: Kamura Warrior Glaive+
description: A weapon fit for a guardian of Kamura. Glaive in hand, go forth and conquer evil!

name: Kamura Ninja Glaive
description: A weapon fit for a guardian of Kamura. Glaive in hand, go forth and conquer evil!

name: Whiplash Stock
description: Once in hand, one can hardly suppress the urge to crush the lowborn under one's thumb.

name: Hidden Scythe II
description: A glaive made for hunting in the dark. Even the blackest night cannot hide its prey.

name: Hidden Scythe I
description: A glaive made for hunting in the dark. Even the blackest night cannot hide its prey.

name: Evening Calm
description: An enhanced Hidden Scythe. Night's darkness silences the screams of its victims.

name: Fox Halberd II
description: A glaive owned by a warrior who served to the death. Its blade dances like the wind.

name: Twilight Repose+
description: A glaive as dark as night. The souls it consumes melt and vanish into the silence.

name: Avidya Scythe
description: A weapon forged by ancient assassins. Cut down prey with chilled, unfeeling indifference.

name: Curved Naganagi
description: An enhanced Fox Halberd. It sweeps over the battlefield like a cool breeze.

name: Fox Halberd I
description: A glaive owned by a warrior who served to the death. Its blade dances like the wind.

name: Eventide Kazanagi
description: By this elegant long blade let woe be severed from your destiny to give eternal joy.

name: Eventide Kazanagi+
description: By this elegant long blade let woe be severed from your destiny to give eternal joy.

name: Frilled Jab I
description: This glaive will rub salt in foes' wounds...if that salt is sleeping powder, that is.

name: Illusory Frilled Jab+
description: An enhanced Frilled Jab. This glaive entangles foes in a nightmare of anguish.

name: Illusory Frilled Jab
description: An enhanced Frilled Jab. This glaive entangles foes in a nightmare of anguish.

name: Frilled Jab II
description: This glaive will rub salt in foes' wounds...if that salt is sleeping powder, that is.

name: Curved Naganagi+
description: An enhanced Fox Halberd. It sweeps over the battlefield like a cool breeze.

name: Nightmare Frilled Jab
description: A fighting pole that saps strength with each jab, fueling fresh nightmares.

name: Nightmare Frilled Jab+
description: A fighting pole that saps strength with each jab, fueling fresh nightmares.

name: Flicker Blizzard Jab
description: A snow fiend's arm, combined with flickering light to freeze even flame.

name: Tigerclaw Glaive
description: No matter what, anyone who comes before this glaive is destined to fall to it.

name: Bloom Snow Jab
description: A club that resembles the arm of an icy monster that is said to appear during snowstorms at night.

name: Tigerclaw Glaive+
description: No matter what, anyone who comes before this glaive is destined to fall to it.

name: Bloom Snow Jab+
description: A club that resembles the arm of an icy monster that is said to appear during snowstorms at night.

name: Tigrex Kaina I
description: A combination of iron and Tigrex parts, this is a truly fearsome glaive.

name: Tigrex Kaina II
description: A combination of iron and Tigrex parts, this is a truly fearsome glaive.

name: Leaping Glaive I
description: A glaive made of Tetranadon parts. Kinsects seem to feed off the water inside.

name: Great Tigerclaw Glaive
description: An insect glaive with the brawn of a Tigrex that leaps from on high to devour all.

name: Great Tigerclaw Glaive+
description: An insect glaive with the brawn of a Tigrex that leaps from on high to devour all.

name: Leapfrog
description: An enhanced Leaping Glaive. Guaranteed to make your enemies hopping mad.

name: True Leapfrog
description: A refined Tetranadon insect glaive. Take advantage of blind spots like a shrewd tactician.

name: Leapfrog+
description: An enhanced Leaping Glaive. Guaranteed to make your enemies hopping mad.

name: Leaping Glaive II
description: A glaive made of Tetranadon parts. Kinsects seem to feed off the water inside.

name: True Leapfrog+
description: A refined Tetranadon insect glaive. Take advantage of blind spots like a shrewd tactician.

name: Iron Blade I
description: While this common glaive may look a little drab, it's perfect for novice hunters.

name: Iron Bayonet I
description: An iron glaive. Simple, but possesses all the features a hunter could ask for.

name: Steel Blade
description: No expense has been spared enhancing this glaive, and it definitely shows.

name: Iron Bayonet II
description: An iron glaive. Simple, but possesses all the features a hunter could ask for.

name: Hiten Blade
description: An enhanced Iron Bayonet. It may look the same, but it is significantly improved.

name: Iron Blade II
description: While this common glaive may look a little drab, it's perfect for novice hunters.

name: Dauntless Bayonet
description: A bayonet that has been honed to transcendent sharpness. Strike with dauntless resolve.

name: Dauntless Bayonet+
description: A bayonet that has been honed to transcendent sharpness. Strike with dauntless resolve.

name: Steel Dauntless Bayonet
description: A bayonet evolved through special improvements, its blade slashes more than just prey.

name: Frostmoon Razorglaive
description: This Lunagaron insect glaive exposes its hidden interior when drawn, as well as its bloodlust.

name: Iceberg Tunggul
description: Cruel ice blade shuddering as if sentient. Flit about, slashing with the moon at your back.

name: Frostmoon Razorglaive+
description: This Lunagaron insect glaive exposes its hidden interior when drawn, as well as its bloodlust.

name: Thunder Tusk
description: A glaive made from materials of the brutal Astalos. Powerful lightning eliminates its prey.

name: Thunder Dragon
description: Persist through the ages, blind to exhausted rebellious tenacity. Sharpen fang, gauge strength.

name: Rathmaul I
description: A glaive made from Rathalos parts. Each strike embodies the king's valiant rage.

name: Thunder Tusk+
description: A glaive made from materials of the brutal Astalos. Powerful lightning eliminates its prey.

name: Firedance Rathmaul
description: An enhanced Rathmaul. Watch its flames dance around your foes as you slaughter them.

name: Rathmaul II
description: A glaive made from Rathalos parts. Each strike embodies the king's valiant rage.

name: Firedance Rathmaul+
description: An enhanced Rathmaul. Watch its flames dance around your foes as you slaughter them.

name: Fiery Rath
description: Persist through the ages, blind to exhausted royal instigation. An everlasting throne.

name: Bolt Chamber I
description: This ghastly glaive steals energy from its prey using an odd, pulsating device.

name: Bolt Chamber II
description: This ghastly glaive steals energy from its prey using an odd, pulsating device.

name: Surge Chamber
description: Embodies the soul of a blood- thirsty beast emerging from the darkness to devour its prey.

name: Surge Chamber+
description: Embodies the soul of a blood- thirsty beast emerging from the darkness to devour its prey.

name: Princess Regalia II
description: A glaive made from Rathian. Its elegant ornamentation is symbolic of royalty.

name: Princess Regalia I
description: A glaive made from Rathian. Its elegant ornamentation is symbolic of royalty.

name: Full Bolt Chamber
description: An enhanced Bolt Chamber. It sucks in blood from prey, then strikes from the sky.

name: Queen Regalia
description: Every rose has its thorns. A cruel, beautiful glaive that embodies the queen herself.

name: Queen Regalia+
description: Every rose has its thorns. A cruel, beautiful glaive that embodies the queen herself.

name: Empress Regalia
description: Adorned with glorious Kinsects, this resplendent piece casts sweet poison.

name: Empress Regalia+
description: Adorned with glorious Kinsects, this resplendent piece casts sweet poison.

name: Rosenstange
description: An extremely tough glaive. Float like a butterfly, sting like an Espinas.

name: Aknosom Pike I
description: A robust glaive made from Aknosom. Its heavy pommel makes it a real hard hitter.

name: Rosenstange+
description: An extremely tough glaive. Float like a butterfly, sting like an Espinas.

name: Dawnmoon Glaive
description: A glaive that glows like red clouds in the east. The mark of one who smites evil.

name: Aknosom Pike II
description: A robust glaive made from Aknosom. Its heavy pommel makes it a real hard hitter.

name: Dawnmoon Beambreak
description: A firebrand glaive wielded by a loyal few. Each strike glitters like sunbeams.

name: Dawnmoon Glaive+
description: A glaive that glows like red clouds in the east. The mark of one who smites evil.

name: Kulu Glaive II
description: A glaive decorated with Kulu-Ya-Ku feathers. It's surprisingly light and fast.

name: Kulu Glaive I
description: A glaive decorated with Kulu-Ya-Ku feathers. It's surprisingly light and fast.

name: Kulu Pike
description: An enhanced Kulu Glaive. Its extreme lightness lets it flutter over a battlefield.

name: Kulu Pike+
description: An enhanced Kulu Glaive. Its extreme lightness lets it flutter over a battlefield.

name: Kulu Katolos Pike
description: A lightweight, yet highly durable weapon. Takes any would-be hunter to the next level...

name: Kadachi Glaive I
description: Glaive made of Tobi-Kadachi scale. Users may call forth truly devastating lightning.

name: Kadachi Glaive II
description: Glaive made of Tobi-Kadachi scale. Users may call forth truly devastating lightning.

name: Shocking Pike+
description: An enhanced Kadachi Glaive rife with thunderous power. Beautiful, yet deadly.

name: Thundering Pike+
description: A mighty weapon tempered by many expert hands, that is protected by a thunder god.

name: Thundering Pike
description: A mighty weapon tempered by many expert hands, that is protected by a thunder god.

name: Lagombaglaive II
description: A glaive with blades like Lagombi ears. Many think its design is pretty cute.

name: Lagombaglaive I
description: A glaive with blades like Lagombi ears. Many think its design is pretty cute.

name: Lagombavarice
description: Enhanced Lagombaglaive. So cold it would freeze users if not for the fur on it.

name: Lagombavarice+
description: Enhanced Lagombaglaive. So cold it would freeze users if not for the fur on it.

name: Sturdy Glaive II
description: This bone glaive was made with quality materials and legendary skill.

name: Bone Staff I
description: A simple bone insect glaive. You can tap into its latent power with the apt upgrades.

name: Aerial Glaive
description: An enhanced Bone Staff. It retains its simplicity, but boasts numerous upgrades.

name: Sturdy Glaive Redux+
description: An enhanced Sturdy Glaive. Made from quality bone for excellent edge and damage.

name: Sturdy Glaive I
description: This bone glaive was made with quality materials and legendary skill.

name: Stalwart Glaive
description: The best materials make the Sturdy into the Stalwart and make all the difference.

name: Stalwart Glaive+
description: The best materials make the Sturdy into the Stalwart and make all the difference.

name: Altair
description: The sharp blades that line both sides of this glaive can slash through anything in their path.

name: Alteal
description: The enhanced form of the Altair. When wielded in battle, sworn enemies are cut down with ease.

name: Altair+
description: The sharp blades that line both sides of this glaive can slash through anything in their path.

name: Shell Intoner
description: A rod used by a river people to channel their god and receive oracles.

name: Sky-High Glaive II
description: A traditionally decorated glaive. Paints mesmerizing yellow swaths in the air.

name: Shell Intoner+
description: A rod used by a river people to channel their god and receive oracles.

name: Crab Intoner
description: The enhanced version of the Shell Intoner, a holy staff believed to dispel evil.

name: Highest of Glaives
description: An enhanced Sky-High Glaive. With a flash of its blade, its prey drop like flies.

name: Sky-High Glaive I
description: A traditionally decorated glaive. Paints mesmerizing yellow swaths in the air.

name: Highest of Glaives+
description: An enhanced Sky-High Glaive. With a flash of its blade, its prey drop like flies.

name: Stratosphere Glaive
description: The upgraded form of the Highest of Glaives. Its golden blade takes down prey like flies.

name: Stratosphere Glaive+
description: The upgraded form of the Highest of Glaives. Its golden blade takes down prey like flies.

name: Diablos Rod I
description: A would-be tyrant must first conquer his subjects, and the world will follow after.

name: Diablos Rod II
description: A would-be tyrant must first conquer his subjects, and the world will follow after.

name: Tyrant Rod
description: An enhanced Diablos Rod. Unbelievably strong: smashes both bones and lives alike.

name: Horned Tyrant+
description: An insect glaive once used by a great ruler. Now it heralds the tyrant's return.

name: Tyrant Rod+
description: An enhanced Diablos Rod. Unbelievably strong: smashes both bones and lives alike.

name: Horned Tyrant
description: An insect glaive once used by a great ruler. Now it heralds the tyrant's return.

name: Flammenkaefer II
description: When blood fills the cracks in this glaive's surface, it pulses with a fiery heat.

name: Flammenkaefer I
description: When blood fills the cracks in this glaive's surface, it pulses with a fiery heat.

name: Gnashing Flammenkaefer
description: An enhanced Flammenkaefer. Good for cauterizing wounds, if foes can survive a hit.

name: Gnashing Flammenkaefer+
description: An enhanced Flammenkaefer. Good for cauterizing wounds, if foes can survive a hit.

name: Lohenspire
description: A weapon that cloaks itself in flame infernal, and thrives on the blood of its fallen prey.

name: Lohenspire+
description: A weapon that cloaks itself in flame infernal, and thrives on the blood of its fallen prey.

name: Gossglaive I
description: Glaive that's both dignified and ghastly. Perfect for striking foes dumb!

name: Abominable Snowpole
description: An enhanced Gossglaive. Even glaciers have fallen to its thunderous blows.

name: Gossglaive II
description: Glaive that's both dignified and ghastly. Perfect for striking foes dumb!

name: Abominable Glaive
description: An enhanced Gossglaive. Even glaciers have fallen to its thunderous blows.

name: Pukei Rod II
description: A glaive made of Pukei-Pukei parts. It's popular for its strength and flexibility.

name: Pukei Rod I
description: A glaive made of Pukei-Pukei parts. It's popular for its strength and flexibility.

name: Far North Pole
description: The Abominable Glaive pushed to the limits of the frozen cold. Put all foes on ice.

name: Datura Pike+
description: An enhanced Pukei Rod. Uses stronger poison that slowly chips away at foes' health.

name: Datura Pike
description: An enhanced Pukei Rod. Uses stronger poison that slowly chips away at foes' health.

name: Datura Plume
description: Abundant venomous feathers make onslaughts from this weapon even more toxic.

name: Datura Plume+
description: Abundant venomous feathers make onslaughts from this weapon even more toxic.

name: Amber Piton I
description: A terrifying weapon imbued with icy power. Call on the bitter cold to petrify foes.

name: Amber Piton II
description: A terrifying weapon imbued with icy power. Call on the bitter cold to petrify foes.

name: Midgard Storm
description: An enhanced Amber Piton. Traps enemies and plunges them into an icy oblivion.

name: Pure Helltone
description: Resistance is futile before the complete cold of this soul-freezing scourge.

name: Fenrir Storm
description: An enhanced Amber Piton. Traps enemies and plunges them into an icy oblivion.

name: Midgard Storm+
description: An enhanced Amber Piton. Traps enemies and plunges them into an icy oblivion.

name: Royal Bloom I
description: A glaive made from light and pliable Royal Ludroth parts. Swings leave a watery trail.

name: Royal Bloom II
description: A glaive made from light and pliable Royal Ludroth parts. Swings leave a watery trail.

name: Bloom Royale
description: An enhanced Royal Bloom. The water it retains creates rainbows with each swing.

name: Bloom Royale+
description: An enhanced Royal Bloom. The water it retains creates rainbows with each swing.

name: Waterspout Bloom+
description: This weapon can harness and manipulate the power of water, enough to wash away your enemies.

name: Golm Glaive+
description: A heavy swing with this mighty armament will cause the ground to rupture and cave in.

name: Golm Glaive
description: A heavy swing with this mighty armament will cause the ground to rupture and cave in.

name: Maneater
description: The size and weight of this blade allow it to unleash epic blows that echo far and wide.

name: Waterspout Bloom
description: This weapon can harness and manipulate the power of water, enough to wash away your enemies.

name: Royal Bolt Scepter I
description: A glaive made of Zinogre. Harness the shocking power of a monarch's roar.

name: Royal Bolt Scepter II
description: A glaive made of Zinogre. Harness the shocking power of a monarch's roar.

name: Despot's Twinbolt
description: Watch as your foes grovel before you, struck down by a monarch's terrific fury.

name: Despot's Twinbolt+
description: Watch as your foes grovel before you, struck down by a monarch's terrific fury.

name: Despot's Twindart
description: The hunter who wields this glaive bends thunder to their will and moves like lightning.

name: Hortadent II
description: A glaive made to look just like a beetle. Certainly not made for the squeamish.

name: Hortadent I
description: A glaive made to look just like a beetle. Certainly not made for the squeamish.

name: Hortadent Brada
description: An enhanced Hortadent. Its jaws are capable of ripping its prey to shreds.

name: Altaroth Trident
description: The ultimate Hortadent. Each swing cuts the air without a sound, silently silencing.

name: Altaroth Trident+
description: The ultimate Hortadent. Each swing cuts the air without a sound, silently silencing.

name: Hortadent Brada+
description: An enhanced Hortadent. Its jaws are capable of ripping its prey to shreds.

name: Rielle Nulo I
description: A glaive, made from Bnahabra parts, that entangles foes, trapping them in its grasp.

name: Rielle Nulo II
description: A glaive, made from Bnahabra parts, that entangles foes, trapping them in its grasp.

name: Rielle Unu
description: An enhanced Rielle Nulo that enmeshes foes like a veil of ivy, climbing to the skies.

name: Rielle Nulo Red I
description: A glaive made from Bnahabra. Its fiery beauty is one of its main selling points.

name: Rielle Nulo Red II
description: A glaive made from Bnahabra. Its fiery beauty is one of its main selling points.

name: Rielle Vermiglio
description: Enhanced Rielle Nulo Red. Sit back as its Kinsects paint the field scarlet.

name: Rielle Du Red
description: Enhanced Rielle Nulo Red. Sit back as its Kinsects paint the field scarlet.

name: Rielle Kvar Red
description: Like a blanket of fire, a swarm of crimson Kinsects rise high into the air.

name: Rielle Nulo Black I
description: A glaive made from carefully selected Bnahabra parts, imbued with draconic power.

name: Rielle Tre Red
description: Like a blanket of fire, a swarm of crimson Kinsects rise high into the air.

name: Rielle Nulo Black II
description: A glaive made from carefully selected Bnahabra parts, imbued with draconic power.

name: Rielle Nerissimo
description: This glaive's Kinsects pull foes into a deep abyss, dark as a dragon's hellish maw.

name: Rielle Du Black
description: This glaive's Kinsects pull foes into a deep abyss, dark as a dragon's hellish maw.

name: Rielle Tre Black
description: This glaive's Kinsects pull foes into a deep abyss, dark as a dragon's hellish maw.

name: Rielle Nulo White II
description: A glaive made of Bnahabra parts that'll give your foes chills with every strike.

name: Rielle Unu White
description: Enhanced Rielle Nulo White. Its Kinsects resemble snowflakes as they dance around foes.

name: Rielle Tre White
description: Enhanced Rielle Du White. Its Kinsects resemble snowflakes as they dance around foes.

name: Rielle Du White
description: Enhanced Rielle Unu White. Its Kinsects resemble snowflakes as they dance around foes.

name: Rielle Nulo White I
description: A glaive made of Bnahabra parts that'll give your foes chills with every strike.

name: Rielle Nulo Green II
description: A glaive made from Bnahabra parts. Its emerald sheen is practically heart-stopping.

name: Rielle Unu Green
description: Enhanced Rielle Nulo Green. This devastating glaive is second to none in beauty.

name: Rielle Nulo Green I
description: A glaive made from Bnahabra parts. Its emerald sheen is practically heart-stopping.

name: Rielle Du Green
description: Enhanced Rielle Unu Green. This devastating glaive is second to none in beauty.

name: Sinister Staff I
description: This glaive strikes like the spiteful roar of the Wyvern of Malice, rife with rage.

name: Sinister Staff II
description: This glaive strikes like the spiteful roar of the Wyvern of Malice, rife with rage.

name: Rielle Tre Green
description: Enhanced Rielle Du Green. This devastating glaive is second to none in beauty.

name: Sinister Shadowstaff
description: Let this glaive's peals of despair ring true, as it thirsts for vengeance.

name: Mighty Soulromancer
description: A wyvern hunter who artfully commanded a vengeful soul was checked by this blade.

name: Devil's Halberd
description: There by a wyvern hunter led to a bloodbath by a vengeful soul, fiendish azure flame.

name: Leumundslist
description: A dire cudgel that clouds the air with the slain Gore Magala's noxious vengeance.

name: Leumundslist+
description: A dire cudgel that clouds the air with the slain Gore Magala's noxious vengeance.

name: Leumundsbruch
description: This staff brings evil to the world. Throughout the land, miasma spreads, laying waste to all.

name: Le Miracle
description: A remarkable golden glaive that delivers the light of salvation with each swing.

name: Le Traqueur
description: The Shagaru Magala, deified as an elegant glaive. Light gushes with every swing.

name: Metal Mauler I
description: A yellow-striped cudgel that combines ogreish might and insect power to conquer all.

name: Metal Mauler II
description: A yellow-striped cudgel that combines ogreish might and insect power to conquer all.

name: Metalmangler
description: An enhanced Metal Mauler, a glaive of destruction that obliterates all opponents.

name: Metal Mutilator
description: The Metal Mauler's ultimate form, as unchallenged as the gods' grip on life itself.

name: Metalmangler+
description: An enhanced Metal Mauler, a glaive of destruction that obliterates all opponents.

name: Demonlord Cudgel
description: A golden, grisly cudgel that rises angrily into the sky like lightning returning to heaven.

name: Azure Elder Glaive I
description: Whilst this glaive may seem elegant, the power within it is absolutely devastating.

name: Azure Elder Glaive II
description: Whilst this glaive may seem elegant, the power within it is absolutely devastating.

name: Abyssal Gale Glaive
description: Foes tremble before this celestial glaive; curb their pathetic attempts to flee.

name: Thunderbolt Glaive I
description: A glaive imbued with Narwa's power. Able to drive off foes with almighty thunder.

name: Skysoar Hurricane
description: The stormy violence leaves man and wyvern alike powerless to move.

name: Skysoar Flash
description: The lightning speed leaves man and wyvern alike powerless to move.

name: Abyssal Storm Glaive
description: Ye who wields this glaive, deliver Narwa's power and lay the bedrock for peace.

name: Daora's Tethidine
description: An enhanced Daora's Entom. A single ray from it bathes the world in silvery beauty.

name: Daora's Entom I
description: A glaive inspired by Kushala Daora. Slices prey like a sunbeam through icy seas.

name: Daora's Tethidine+
description: An enhanced Daora's Entom. A single ray from it bathes the world in silvery beauty.

name: Daora's Samudra
description: Chunks of ice rain from the heavens, commanded by this glaive to strike down foes.

name: Caster's Rod I
description: A Chameleos staff bathed in phantom fire. Its sorcery can awaken ancient demons.

name: Hazy Caster+
description: An enhanced Caster's Rod. Its demonic powers let it bend the wills of its prey.

name: Hazy Caster
description: An enhanced Caster's Rod. Its demonic powers let it bend the wills of its prey.

name: Veil Caster
description: A magical staff of confusion with an ever-changing force. Held aloft, it wreaks havoc.

name: Crimson Springwing
description: Upset the balance of heaven and earthraise your glaive, and ready for the slaughter.

name: Redwing Glaive I
description: A crimson Valstrax glaive. Even its Kinsects seem to glow a ferocious red.

name: Reddnaught Shuma
description: Upset the balance of heaven and earthraise your glaive, and ready for the slaughter.

name: Abyssal Insectoid
description: Fourteen terrors from the black abyss. The eleventh was a horde to devour all.

name: Deathport Staff I
description: A weapon based on a tyrant's staff. Those who see it bow down, begging for mercy.

name: Garamorse+
description: An enhanced Deathport Staff. Instills fear in all who behold its penetrating gaze.

name: Darkmorse
description: A hammer that has gained the power of darkness to control the evil that yet inhabits it.

name: Garamorse
description: An enhanced Deathport Staff. Instills fear in all who behold its penetrating gaze.

name: Deathport Staff II
description: A weapon based on a tyrant's staff. Those who see it bow down, begging for mercy.

name: Magia Pitareen I
description: A glaive made following many a request from women. A fine blend of form and function.

name: Magia Crescent+
description: An enhanced Magia Pitareen. Guaranteed to be the hottest glaive this hunting season!

name: Magia Crescent
description: An enhanced Magia Pitareen. Guaranteed to be the hottest glaive this hunting season!

name: Brush Glaive I
description: Calm your mind and paint the the battlefield red! Do stay inside the lines, though.

name: Watercolor Glaive
description: With glaive as your brush, and foes as your canvas, you can create a masterpiece!

name: Poet's Brush Glaive
description: The way of the hunter never ends. The peak never reached. The portrait never finished.

name: Staff of Laertes
description: This staff has been fully upgraded and strengthened! A must-have for female hunters!

name: Brush Glaive II
description: Calm your mind and paint the the battlefield red! Do stay inside the lines, though.

name: New World Brush Glaive
description: The image of a new light, a new life, a new dawn... May the brush strokes never cease!

name: Royal Order's Glaive
description: An insect glaive used by knights of the Order. Only those with unwavering hope may wield it.

name: Antique Machina IG
description: An insect glaive of emerald and gold furnished with a mechanism utilizing afflicted energy.

name: Royal Order's Glaive+
